title: Unable to actually connect to games
body:
O' Targons Blade/Porocles, hear my plea!

Not sure what caused this -- I go through champ select normally, once it ends, I simply do not get put in game. Not sure what's causing this -- tested on both old and new client, same result. This has never happened to me before. I tried reconnecting multiple times, with no luck.

I'm not risking playing more games because I don't want to rack up penalties, and I would really appreciate some help on this. I'm not sure where to start.

replies.body: At your side, friend!  It sounds like your network could be going into a dormant state after champion select.  This can happen when an unstable connection is failing to transition over to the game server.  Run through each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide and test it in a custom game.  Let me know how it goes!

Well, I used the hextech repair tool to reinstall League. That fixed it for me.
(Leaving this here in case anyone else has the same problem).
